Package academy.mindswap.game

Class ConnectFourHandler

java.lang.Object
academy.mindswap.game.ConnectFourHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ConnectFourHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Class ConnectFourHandler implements the interface Runnable. This one handles all the game logics.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method is responsible for starting the game and creating a new game when ever it starts, and ensures that the game remains active as long as there's a started Game. Waits a bit so that players can read the instructions. Broadcasts current player turn. Get player turn input and checks from valid input. Place current player move. Checks for winner. Checks for draw. Broadcasts the board with the new move. Switch move and player.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • playAgain

      public void playAgain()

      This public void method is responsible for starting the game and Broadcast the board.

      This public synchronized void method sends the players inputs.

    • theGameCanStart

      public boolean theGameCanStart()
      This public synchronized boolean verify if the game can start.
      Returns:
      true the game will start.
